content.rendered:
We at Sunnyside Exports and Imports specialized in antique clocks, clock parts and unique furniture pieces from Vietnam and the United States. Our fascination and appreciation for impeccable craftsmanship and designs will provide a wide range of items that can be used as discussion pieces or display. We have recently partnered with vendors in Southeast Asia to bring forth office decorations at affordable prices with premium quality. We valued the distinct taste of each person so we have a section where one can customize a piece and we will try to create it to satisfaction.

Ensuring all information is private and secure is our top priority. We provide free return or exchange up to 30 days on gift cards and decorations. A sale tax of 9.25% will be added to all California residents. Our motto is to give satisfaction to every single customer, so any displeasure with any of our items, please reach out to us by email. We will promptly get on the case and make it right.
